Name: Emotes Creator Tool
About the game: Emotes Creator Tool (ECT) is a Windows software which allows you to create unique emotes without any drawing skills. You can use these emotes on twitch,youtube, discord or any other platform. Even if youâ€™re not a streamer, you can create avatars for your social media profiles. Hundreds of assets are at your disposition to create your original emotes and avatar. This is what you can do: Change color Change saturation Change luminosity Rotation Resize Move freely each element Merge layers Duplicate layers Flip layers Once your emote is ready you can: Create the png file (in various sizes) Export your template Import a template Create a miniature There's also a randomizer if you don't find good ideas!
